price: “Teško vama i onima koje, umjesto Allaha, obožavate! Zašto se ne opametite?”
arabic: أُفّٖ لَّكُمۡ وَلِمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: uffin lakum walimā taʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi afalā taʿqilūna
